interval.description: Duration of ticks to wait between the damage.
interval.markdownDescription: Duration of ticks to wait between the damage.

onset_delay.description: How many ticks the power has to be active in order to apply the first damage. If not set, this will be equal to `interval`.
onset_delay.markdownDescription: How many ticks the power has to be active in order to apply the first damage. If not set, this will be equal to `interval`.

damage.description: How much damage will be dealt each interval.
damage.markdownDescription: How much damage will be dealt each interval.

damage_easy.description: How much damage will be dealt each interval on Easy difficulty. If not set, this will be equal to `damage`.
damage_easy.markdownDescription: How much damage will be dealt each interval on Easy difficulty. If not set, this will be equal to `damage`.

damage_type.description: The damage type this power uses.
damage_type.markdownDescription: The damage type this power uses.

protection_enchantment.description: If set, the total amount of levels of this enchantment will be counted on the player's armor to increase the `onset_delay`.
protection_enchantment.markdownDescription: If set, the total amount of levels of this enchantment will be counted on the player's armor to increase the `onset_delay`.

protection_effectiveness.description: If `protection_enchantment` is set, this multiplier scales how effective it will be (1.0 = time the `onset_delay` is increased is the same as with Hydrophobia and Water Protection).
protection_effectiveness.markdownDescription: If `protection_enchantment` is set, this multiplier scales how effective it will be (1.0 = time the `onset_delay` is increased is the same as with Hydrophobia and Water Protection).

type.description:
## Damage Over Time

---



[Power Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/damage_over_time)

Inflicts damage on the entity that has the power from a specified damage source within the specified interval.

Type ID: `origins:damage_over_time`




---

### Examples

```json
{
  	"type": "origins:damage_over_time",
  	"interval": 20,
  	"onset_delay": 1,
  	"damage": 2,
  	"damage_easy": 1,
  	"damage_type": "origins:hurt_by_water",
  	"protection_enchantment": "origins:water_protection",
  	"protection_effectiveness": 1.0,
  	"condition": {
    	"type": "origins:or",
    	"conditions": [
	      	{
	        	"type": "origins:fluid_height",
		        "fluid": "minecraft:water",
	        	"comparison": ">",
	        	"compare_to": 0.0
	      	},
	      	{
	        	"type": "origins:in_rain"
	      	}
    	]
  	}
}
```

This example will deal damage to the entity if the entity is in water.
type.markdownDescription:

Inflicts damage on the entity that has the power from a specified damage source within the specified interval.

Type ID: `origins:damage_over_time`


This example will deal damage to the entity if the entity is in water.
